mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(boardId, userId, nickname, content, addDate, modDate) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{userId}, #{nickname}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: update reply set content=#{content}, modDate=NOW() where replyId=#{replyId}
mapper.select: select * from reply where boardId=#{boardId} order by replyId asc limit #{skip}, #{size}
select count(*) from reply where boardId=#{boardId}
